title: My Favorite Distraction
description: Book 1 of series. Katarina’s perspective.This book contains erotic scenes.If you could escape your life, would you? I did. I reinvented myself, blended in, and concealed myself in the background. I was invisible, just like I wanted to be, at least for a little while. That was until he saw me. Every day he would sit with me and together we were protected by an invisible bubble. It was perfect.He was a perfect distraction and my favorite one, but I knew better than to have a favorite thing.Jason is a charming man. He gets what he wants and right now his sole interest is the quiet beauty with the velvety blue eyes. He bides his time watching, learning, and controlling his need to get close to her. Jason uses women to fill the void in his heart. Katarina tests his patience, control, and will-power. He finds himself craving every piece of her.This light-hearted romance takes you on an erotic ride that will definitely surprise readers, and deliver a compelling story that speaks to the very nature of love and loss as it explores a woman’s struggle to trust in a man, fearing the trust will be broken again.
author: Stephanie Jean
